Name: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' occurrences across all cases
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities

Name: Percentage of process variants that include 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all cases

Name: Number of times 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' is directly preceded by 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' that occurs after 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' in the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Frequency of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' compared to the frequency of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases where 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' eventually leads to 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Number of variants in which 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' appears only after at least one 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' has occurred
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' occurrences that are part of accepted manuscript pathways (i.e., following 'RW-EIC Accept')
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'RW-EIC Accept'

Name: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' that occurs within 7 days after 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'
Metric: the average of the function base < 7 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Ratio of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' occurrences to total number of 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' events
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' occurs

Name: Number of times 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' appears as the penultimate activity before process completion
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities

Name: Percentage of cases containing 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' that do not contain 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all cases where 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' does not happen

Name: Frequency of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' in variants with performance duration above the median variant duration
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities

Name: Frequency of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' in cases that previously contained 'SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit'
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'", 'aggregation': 'total', 'filter': "case_has_activity('SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit')"}"
